00004 template <class T>
00005 struct dispLims {
00006    T min;
00007    T max;
00008 };
00009 
00010 template <class Y>
00011 inline bool SCAL_RANGE_SEGFUNC(const Y val){ return (bool)val; }

00014 template <class T, class Y>
00015 class XVScalarRangeTable:public XVScalarTable<T,Y> {
00016   protected:
00017     using XVScalarTable<T,Y>::table;
00018 
00019   private:
00020     dispLims<T> range;
00021   public:
00022     XVScalarRangeTable(dispLims<T> & set_range):
00023                          XVScalarTable<T,Y>(),
00024                     range(set_range){};
00025     ~XVScalarRangeTable() {};
00026     Y computeValue(T val) {if(val>=range.min && val<range.max)
00027                         return (Y)(val-range.min+1); else return 0;};
00028     void buildTable(void);
00029 };
